incoming.title: Incoming Orders
incoming.footer: {count, plural, =1 {# order} other {# orders}} waiting for review
incoming.empty: There are no incoming orders at the moment.

accepted.title: Accepted Orders
accepted.empty: You have not accepted any orders.

waiting.title: Waiting for Pickup
waiting.footer: {count, plural, =1 {# order} other {# orders}} ready for pickup
waiting.empty: All completed orders have been picked up.

finished.title: Finished Orders
finished.empty: Finished orders will show up here.

details.empty: Click on any order from the sidebar to display it here.

acceptOrder.title: Accept Order
acceptOrder.description: Are you sure you want to accept this order?

rejectOrder.title: Reject Order
rejectOrder.description: Are you sure you want to reject this order?

markAsReady.title: Mark as Ready for Pickup
markAsReady.description: By marking this order as ready, you will notify the customer that it is available for pickup. Continue?

markAsDone.title: Mark as Done
markAsDone.description: By marking this order as done, you are confirming the customer has received it. Continue?

signOut.title: Sign Out
signOut.description: Are you sure you want to sign out?
